name: SSSSSSSECAM!!!!
description:
a snake game i made in the last 5-6 hours of original jam time.

----CONTROLS----

ARROWKEYS - MOVE
SPACE - ENTER MENUS
ENTER - PAUSE
F1 - TOGGLE CRT OVERLAY
F2 - TOGGLE CRT SCAN-LINES

CREDITS:

ART / DESIGN / PROGRAMING / ECT:  LADY LEIA
MUSIC: rezoner https://opengameart.org/content/puzzle-tune-1

offering the source code as well... :3
